section.20: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Salamah and Nafi', from Ibn Umar, from Hafsah that:The Prophet (ï·º) used to pray two brief rak'ahs between the call (The adhan) and the Iqamah, the two rak'ahs of Fajr
